newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: FORECAST - Dutch company results week of Feb 17.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Dutch company results week of Feb 17.

text.p: Analysts' estimates of Dutch company results for week beginning Monday Feb 17:
NOTES - Profit figures exclude extraordinary items and are in millions of guilders unless otherwise stated.
Oce van der Grinten figure is a provisional net profit figure published by the company on Jan 10.

Vendex operating profit estimates include real estate income. Net profit estimates include "changes in value". Consensus estimates excluding these items are 378 million guilders for operating profit and 390 million for net profit.

The following securities houses contributed to this survey: Bangert Pontier, Delta Lloyd Bank, Generale Bank, ING, Kempen & Co, Labouchere, Van Lanschot, MeesPierson, NIBStrating, Rabo/IRIS, Suez, Wesselius.
